name: Spatium - Space Elevator Program
description:
Build the low-budget space elevator to connect all the planets.

Howdy,  space engineer! Your task for today is to command the ground control to lay down an elevator block. The higher you go, the less stable the structure can be. 

But don't worry, our engineers will build the space bridges to stabilize them for you.

How to play

  • Click or tap the screen to build the space elevator
  • Build as high as you can to reach the other side

Controls

  • Space or mouse-click to place an elevator block
  • Press R to quickly restart

To-do list

  • Launch this game on Android and iOS platform

TO THE SUN!
